Root Cause: Out of memory error, leading to process killing

Explanation.Log Message: Out of memory: Kill process 1234 (java) score 500 or sacrifice child

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The system is running out of memory, causing the kernel to kill processes.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: This issue can cause processes to be terminated, leading to application crashes and data loss.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: This issue may be related to memory-intensive applications or inadequate system resources.

Explanation.Conclusion: The log message indicates that the system is out of memory, leading to process killing.
